Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Configure \Con*fig"ure\, v. t. [imp. & p. p. {Configured}; p. pr. & vb. n. {Configuring}.] [L. configurare: cf. F. configurer. See {Configurate}.] To arrange or dispose in a certain form, figure, or shape. --Bentley. [1913 Webster]
configure v : set up for a particular purpose; "configure my new computer"; "configure a plane for a combat mission"
